attributes.action: Remove John Bercow from the position of Speaker of the House
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An MP who flipped his second home to exploit the expenses system and blatantly avoided paying capital gains tax should not have even been nominated for Speaker never mind voted in. When will this government listen, stop playing games for you own political gain and do the right thing for once and clean up politics. John Bercow, who has proven that he is morally reprehensible is not the man to do this.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
